Name: Septium Vein
Effect: Increase all types of sepith dropped by monsters by 1-2.

Name: Yin-Yang
Effect: Combine the effects of Haze and Heal.

Name: Ingenuity
Effect: Recover small amounts of EP while walking.

Name: Sleep
Effect: Put enemy to sleep with 10% success.

Name: Sleep 2
Effect: Put enemy to sleep with 20% success.

Name: Impede 1
Effect: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 10% success rate.

Name: Impede 2
Effect: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 15% success rate.

Name: Impede 3
Effect: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 20% success rate.

Name: Impede 4
Effect: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 25% success rate.

Name: Wood Gem
Effect: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 30% success rate. (Impede 5)

Name: Absorb
Effect: Recover 2% of user's max HP when defeating an enemy.

Name: Cast 1
Effect: Time to cast arts is cut.

Name: Cast 2
Effect: Time to cast arts is greatly cut.

Name: Luck
Effect: Increases enemy item drop rate by 30%.

Name: Eagle Eye
Effect: Can see enemies from a distance.

Name: Heaven's Eye
Effect: Combine the effects of Eagle Eye and Information.

Name: Information
Effect: Be able to perceive enemy status.
